name: FOUND: A HIDDEN OBJECT ADVENTURE
summary: Found: A Hidden Object Adventure is, as the name states, a hidden-object game. You will search various locales to find hidden items. While you can search as long as you need, you are timed. The shorter time it takes you to find all the listed items, the greater your reward. The rewards, like energy or money, are needed to begin searches or construct items to complete quests. If you lack the funds or energy you need, you can purchase some with real-world money.
